TypeSignature.Value: Public NotInheritable Class Array Inherits Object
public ref class Array sealed : Java::Lang::Object
.class public auto ansi sealed beforefieldinit Array extends Java.Lang.Object

Docs.summary: The Array class provides static methods to dynamically create and access Java arrays.

remarks.para: The Array class provides static methods to dynamically create and access Java arrays.
Array permits widening conversions to occur during a get or set operation, but throws an IllegalArgumentException if a narrowing conversion would occur.
Added in 1.1.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.summary: Returns the value of the indexed component in the specified array object.
Docs.returns: the (possibly wrapped) value of the indexed component in the specified array

remarks.para: Returns the value of the indexed component in the specified array object. The value is automatically wrapped in an object if it has a primitive type.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.exception: if array is not an array

public static Java.Lang.Object NewInstance (Java.Lang.Class componentType, int length);
.method public static hidebysig class Java.Lang.Object NewInstance(class Java.Lang.Class componentType, int32 length) cil managed
static member NewInstance : Java.Lang.Class * int -> Java.Lang.Object

Docs.param: the Class object representing the component type of the new array
the length of the new array
Docs.summary: Creates a new array with the specified component type and length.

remarks.para: Creates a new array with the specified component type and length. Invoking this method is equivalent to creating an array as follows: <blockquote>
The number of dimensions of the new array must not exceed 255.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

MemberSignature.Value: Public Shared Function NewInstance (componentType As Class, ParamArray dimensions As Integer()) As Object
public: static Java::Lang::Object ^ NewInstance(Java::Lang::Class ^ componentType, ... cli::array <int> ^ dimensions);
public static Java.Lang.Object NewInstance (Java.Lang.Class componentType, params int[]? dimensions);
.method public static hidebysig class Java.Lang.Object NewInstance(class Java.Lang.Class componentType, int32[] dimensions) cil managed
static member NewInstance : Java.Lang.Class * int[] -> Java.Lang.Object

Docs.param: the Class object representing the component type of the new array
an array of int representing the dimensions of the new array
Docs.summary: Creates a new array with the specified component type and dimensions.

remarks.para: Creates a new array with the specified component type and dimensions. If componentType represents a non-array class or interface, the new array has dimensions.length dimensions and componentType as its component type. If componentType represents an array class, the number of dimensions of the new array is equal to the sum of dimensions.length and the number of dimensions of componentType. In this case, the component type of the new array is the component type of componentType.
The number of dimensions of the new array must not exceed 255.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.

Docs.param: the new value of the indexed component
Docs.summary: Sets the value of the indexed component of the specified array object to the specified new value.

remarks.para: Sets the value of the indexed component of the specified array object to the specified new value. The new value is first automatically unwrapped if the array has a primitive component type.
Portions of this page are modifications based on work created and shared by the Android Open Source Project and used according to terms described in the Creative Commons 2.5 Attribution License.
